Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

bill.summary:
Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from January 6, 2005, until January 20, 2005 (or until another time of reassembly under this concurrent resolution), from January 20, 2005, until January 25, 2005 (or until another time of reassembly), and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from January 6 or 7, 2005, until January 20, 2005 (or until another time of reassembly).
Requires the Speaker of the House and the Majority Leader of the Senate, or their respective designees, acting jointly after consultation with the Minority Leaders of the House and of the Senate, to notify the Members of the House and the Senate, respectively, to reassemble at such place and time as they may designate whenever, in their opinion, the public interest shall warrant it.
